title: Cloud Engineer
content: Transition app teams from traditional infrastructure to containers with Kubernetes on AWS EKS
Architect & implement deployment strategies in EKS for app teams such as A/B Testing, Blue-Green deployments, Canary Testing
Design & Manage cloud solutions in AWS targeting performance, availability, and security
Advise developers on best practices for cloud
Hands-on IaC experience with AWS CDK & Cloudformation, Chef, and Ansible
Research new cloud tools to improve efficiency and user adoption
Automate cost management and alerting with AWS Cloudwatch and Lambda
Create log, metric, and alerting pipelines from cluster to SumoLogic, Datadog, and PagerDuty
Build CI/CD pipelines for developers with Atlassian Bamboo & Bitbucket
Create & Manage DNS records, Load balancers, & Ingress Controllers

title: Founder
content: Assess infrastructure model(s), security, and resources being used
Create optimization plan to reduce cloud infrastructure cost
Improve security practices and IAM model
Advise for best cloud practices

title: Full Stack Engineer
content: Drive up usage for company intranet by 30% with website redesign. New functionality included search UI redesign and optimization, navigation, adding likes/unlikes, employee profiles, and more

Decrease admin tasks by developing a Slackbot in Python (hosted on AWS Lambda). Slackbot automated admin responsibilities such as approving users for Slack, sending email invites, answering FAQ's, and more
Automate report processing job with serverless batch processing (AWS Lambda) that transformed thousands of rows of data into a static visual dashboard with meaningful insights
Extending company employee information API to live-update Intranet information about employees (active status, position, phone, etc)

title: Web Developer - Intern
content: Developed site skeletons with HTML, CSS, and Javascript
Researched safer web interactivity on websites to reduce vulnerability from exploits

title: Computer Specialist
content: Wrote python scripts for automating edits in Adobe Premiere
Provided computer support (printing, performance, software/hardware issues & updates)
